name: Davidduc's Apartment Mac Dinh Chi
address: 13 Mac Dinh Chi, Truc Bach , Ba Dinh, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Davidduc's Apartment Mac Dinh Chi offers pet-friendly accommodation in Hanoi. Tran Quoc Pagoda is 400 metres away. Free WiFi is provided .

All units include a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV.

Quan Thanh Temple is 600 metres from Davidduc's Apartment Mac Dinh Chi. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 19 km from Davidduc's Apartment Mac Dinh Chi.
